trans-unit.source: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper, metoder og hendelser som er relatert til dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene som vises i den `My.Application` objekt Returner data som er forbundet med den gjeldende applikasjons- eller DLL-filen.

trans-unit.source: No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`.
trans-unit.target: Ingen systemnivå informasjon kan ikke endres med `My.Application`.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase> provides members that are available in all projects.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application` -objektet består av følgende klasser:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som er tilgjengelige i alle prosjekter.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: - WindowsFormsApplicationBase provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: -WindowsFormsApplicationBase inneholder medlemmer som ikke er tilgjengelig i Windows Forms-programmer.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> provides members that are available in console applications.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som er tilgjengelige i konsollen programmer.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref> class with the specified authentication mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"> </xref> klasse angitt godkjenningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: If the `authenticationMode` parameter is the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode> enumeration value, then this constructor attempts to set the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal> for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `authenticationMode` parameteren er av <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>opplistingsverdien, og deretter denne konstruktøren prøver å angi gjeldende <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>egenskapen til den <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal>for gjeldende bruker.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the `authenticationMode` parameter is the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode> enumeration value, then this constructor leaves the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `authenticationMode` parameteren er av <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>opplistingsverdien, og deretter denne konstruktøren forlater gjeldende <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>egenskapen unchanged.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application's authentication mode.
trans-unit.target: Angir programmets godkjenningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> object for the current thread of a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende koblingen av et Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced member; it does not appear in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.
trans-unit.target: Dette er et avansert medlem; Det vises ikke i IntelliSense med mindre du velger den **alle** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> object for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> objekt for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: That object contains contextual information about the thread.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om tråden.

trans-unit.source: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Behandler alle Windows-meldinger i meldingskøen for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.DoEvents` method allows your application to handle other events that might be raised while you code runs.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden kan programmet til å behandle andre hendelser som kan oppstå når du code kjører.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.DoEvents` method has the same behavior as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden har på samme måte som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you run a Windows Forms application, it creates a new form, which then waits for events to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Når du kjører en Windows Forms-program, oppretter et nytt skjema, som deretter venter på hendelser som skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: Each time the form handles an event, such as a button click, it processes all the code associated with that event.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang skjemaet behandler en hendelse som en knapp klikker, behandler den all kode som er knyttet til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: All other events wait in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre hendelser vente i køen.

trans-unit.source: While your code handles the event, your application does not respond.
trans-unit.target: Under koden behandler hendelsen, svarer ikke programmet.

trans-unit.source: For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet for eksempel ikke oppdateres hvis et annet vindu drar øverst.

trans-unit.source: If you call `My.Application.DoEvents` in your code, your application can handle the other events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller `My.Application.DoEvents` i koden, kan programmet ditt behandle andre hendelser.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your code adds data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> in a loop, and after each step of the loop it calls `My.Application.DoEvents`, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koden legger til data til for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>i en sløyfe og etter hvert trinn i sløyfen kaller `My.Application.DoEvents`, skjemaet oppdateres når du et nytt vindu drar over den.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you remove `My.Application.DoEvents` from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner `My.Application.DoEvents` fra koden, vil ikke skjemaet oppdateres til hendelsesbehandlingen Klikk av-knappen er ferdig kjøring.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bruker du denne metoden i en sløyfe å behandle meldinger.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `My.Application.DoEvents` method does not process events in exactly the same way as the form does.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden behandler ikke hendelser på samme måte som i skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Use multithreading to make the form directly handle the events.
trans-unit.target: Bruk flertrådskjøring å gjøre skjemaet direkte behandle hendelser.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Multithreaded Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [programmer med flere tråder](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If a method that handles a user interface (UI) event calls the `My.Application.DoEvents` method, the method might be re-entered before it finishes.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Hvis kaller en metode som behandler en hendelse i brukergrensesnittet (UI) bruker den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden metoden kan være angitt på nytt før den avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: This can happen because the `My.Application.DoEvents` method processes Windows messages, and Windows messages can raise events.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden behandler meldinger for Windows og Windows-meldinger kan øke hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Application.DoEvents` method.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser et eksempel på en oppgave som involverer den `My.Application.DoEvents` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this application will use the Windows XP styles for windows, controls, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette programmet skal bruke Windows XP-stiler for windows, styrer og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method uses this property to determine whether to call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>Metoden bruker denne egenskapen for å finne ut om du vil kalle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this application will use the XP Windows styles for windows, controls, and so on.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dette programmet skal bruke Windows XP-stiler for windows, styrer og så videre.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Hides the application's splash screen.
trans-unit.target: Skjuler programmets velkomstbildet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class creates the splash screen on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>klassen oppretter velkomstbildet i en egen tråd.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: This method marshals the call to the correct thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden marshals kallet til riktig tråden.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the main form is done loading.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når skjemaet primære gjøres lasting.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette programmet er en enkel forekomst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A> method uses this property to determine whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A>metoden bruker denne egenskapen til å finne ut om dette programmet er en enkel forekomst.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dette programmet er en enkel forekomst.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the main form for this application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skjemaet primære for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Use the `MainForm` property to get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object that the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model uses as the application's main form.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `MainForm` til å hente eller angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>objekt som bruker Visual Basic programmet startet eller avslutte modellen som programmets skjema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property supports the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Startup/Shutdown model.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen støtter det [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet startet eller avslutte modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i denne egenskapen er ikke opprettholdt når programmet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: To change the main form permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre skjemaet primære permanent, må du endre innstillingen i den **prosjektet Designer**.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the main form for this application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skjemaet primære for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Determines the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer minimumslengden tid i millisekunder velkomstbildet vises.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property allows you to specify the minimum length of time you want the application's splash screen to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` egenskapen lar deg angi minimumslengden du vil programmets velkomstbildet som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: If the main form finishes initializing in less time than what is specified by this property, the splash screen remains until the requested amount of time passes, at which time the main form is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det primære skjemaet avsluttes initialisering på kortere tid enn det er angitt av denne egenskapen, forblir velkomstbildet før den forespurte mengden tiden går, da skjemaet primære vises.

trans-unit.source: If your application takes longer to start, the splash screen is closed once the main form becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker lenger tid å starte, lukkes velkomstbildet når skjemaet primære aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: When you add a splash screen to your application using the Project Designer, it sets the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property to 2000, giving a minimum display time of two seconds.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en velkomstbildet programmet ved hjelp av prosjektet Designer, settes den `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` egenskapen 2000, gir gangen minste visning av to sekundene.

trans-unit.source: This property supports the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen støtter det [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You should set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` egenskap i en metode som overstyrer den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>eller <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>metode.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Code that overrides methods of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Kode som overstyrer metoder for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>klassen må angis i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| | Tilgang til vinduet kode redigeringsprogrammet for overstyrer medlemmer | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: Med et prosjekt som er valgt i **Løsningsutforsker**, klikker du **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3. Velg den **vise programmet hendelser** for å åpne redigeringsprogrammet for koden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Minimumslengden tid i millisekunder velkomstbildet vises.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the network availability changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når nettverket tilgjengeligheten endres.

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time that the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et program i `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` hendelsen hver gang tilgjengeligheten av network endres.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A> property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A>for den `e` parameter for å hente nye tilstanden for nettverksforbindelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hente gjeldende status for nettverkstilkoblingen, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår i programmets hovedtråden med de andre hendelsene i brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: This enables the event handler to access directly the application's UI.
trans-unit.target: Dette aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen å få direkte tilgang til programmets brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis programmet er opptatt med å behandle en annen brukergrensesnittet-hendelse når denne hendelsen oppstår, denne hendelsen kan ikke behandles før andre hendelsesbehandlingen avsluttes eller kaller den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> event provides the same functionality as this event but is available for all application types.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>hendelsen fungerer på samme måte som denne hendelsen men er tilgjengelig for alle programtyper.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>

trans-unit.source: The code for the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Koden for den `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` hendelsesbehandlingen er lagret i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.

trans-unit.target: || |-| | Tilgang til vinduet Redigeringsprogram for kode for programmet hendelser | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer.**
trans-unit.target: Har et prosjekt som er valgt i **Solution Explorer.**

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: Klikk **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3. Velg den **vise programmet hendelser** for å åpne redigeringsprogrammet for koden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).| > [!NOTE] > Many network hubs will provide a network connection even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [programmet siden prosjektet Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). | > [!NOTE] > Mange nettverkshuber gir en nettverkstilkobling selv om hub er koblet fra et større nettverk.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates change in the connection between the computer and a hub.
trans-unit.target: For kablet tilkoblinger angir denne hendelsen derfor endring i tilkoblingen mellom datamaskinen og en hub.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications when they are run on Windows 95 and Windows 98, or when they are run by a non-administrator on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` denne hendelsen oppstår ikke av når de kjører i Windows 95 og Windows 98, eller når de kjøres av en ikke-administrator på Windows 2000.

trans-unit.source: If your application might run on those operating systems, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property to check for network availability.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet kan kjøre på disse operativsystemer, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>til å se etter tilgjengeligheten.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to emit code that configures the splash screen and main form.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gir du en designer utdata fra kode som konfigurerer velkomstbildet og skjema.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter ingenting som standard.

trans-unit.source: However, when you select a main form for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides this method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property to a new instance of the main form.
trans-unit.target: Når du imidlertid velge et skjema for programmet i den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **prosjektet Designer**, designer overstyrer denne metoden med en metode som angir den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>egenskapen til en ny forekomst av skjemaet.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to emit code that initializes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gir du en designer utdata fra kode som initialiserer velkomstbildet.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter ingenting som standard.

trans-unit.source: If you select a splash screen for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the OnCreateSplashScreen method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A> property to a new instance of the splash-screen form.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger en velkomstbildet for programmet i den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **prosjektet Designer**, designer overstyrer metoden OnCreateSplashScreen med en metode som angir den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A>egenskapen til en ny forekomst av velkomstbildet formatet.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the visual styles, text display styles, and current principal for the main application thread (if the application uses Windows authentication), and initializes the splash screen, if defined.
trans-unit.target: Angir den visuelle stiler tekst visningsstiler og gjeldende sikkerhetskontohaver for hovedprogramtråden (Hvis programmet bruker Windows-godkjenning), og initialiserer velkomstbildet, hvis angitt.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method sets the visual styles, text display styles, and current principal for the main application thread (if the application uses Windows authentication), and calls `ShowSplashScreen` if neither `/nosplash` nor `-nosplash` is used as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden settes som standard den visuelle stiler tekst visningsstiler og gjeldende sikkerhetskontohaver for hovedprogramtråden (Hvis programmet bruker Windows-godkjenning), og kall `ShowSplashScreen` Hvis verken `/nosplash` eller `-nosplash` brukes som en kommandolinjeargumenter.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the following methods: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller følgende metoder:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>, containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>, som inneholder kommandolinjeargumenter som strenger for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating if application startup should continue.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om programmet startet skal fortsette.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Provides the starting point for when the main application is ready to start running, after the initialization is done.
trans-unit.target: Angir startpunktet for når primære programmet er klar til å kjøre etter at initialiseringen er ferdig.

trans-unit.source: By default, before it enters the Windows Forms message loop, this method calls the `OnCreateMainForm` (to create the application's main form) and `HideSplashScreen` (to close the splash screen) methods: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard før den går inn i Windows Forms meldingen sløyfen denne metodekall i `OnCreateMainForm` (for å opprette programmets skjema) og `HideSplashScreen` (for å lukke velkomstbildet) metoder:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides a way for a designer to emit code that initializes the main form.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for en designer utdata fra kode som initialiserer primære skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter ingenting som standard.

trans-unit.source: However, when you select a main form for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A> method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property to a new instance of the main form.
trans-unit.target: Når du imidlertid velge et skjema for programmet i det [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **prosjektet Designer**, designer overstyrer i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>metode med en metode som angir det <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>egenskapen til en ny forekomst av skjemaet primære.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application has a splash screen defined and it is open, this method closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet har en velkomstbildet definert, og den er åpen, lukker denne metoden velkomstbildet.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: Som standard lukker denne metoden velkomstbildet.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gjør det mulig for å kjøre når programmet avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: This method does not run if an unhandled exception occurs in the main application.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kjører ikke hvis det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i den primære applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer som standard i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown>hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when the application starts.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gjør det mulig for å kjøre når applikasjonen starter.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer som standard i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the event argument.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kan angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for argumentet hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `True`, this method returns `False` to cancel the application startup.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>er `True`, metoden returnerer `False` å avbryte programmet startet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `True`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, denne metoden returnerer `True`.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the command-line arguments of the application and indicates whether the application startup should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder kommandolinjeargumenter for applikasjonen, og angir om programmet startet bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates if the application should continue starting up.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om programmet skal fortsette starter.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts.
trans-unit.target: Tillater kode kjøres når et etterfølgende forekomst av en enkel forekomst programmet starter når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer som standard i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A> property of the event argument.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kan angi den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>for argumentet hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A> is `True`, the method activates the main form.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>er `True`, metoden aktiveres i skjema.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the main form is left in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Ellers beholdes skjemaet primære i den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder kommandolinjeargumenter for etterfølgende programmet-forekomsten, og angir om den første forekomsten av programmet skal hentes til forgrunnen ved avslutningen behandlingsprogrammet unntak.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when an unhandled exception occurs in the application.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gjør det mulig for å kjøre når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event as long as a debugger is not attached and the user is handling the `UnhandledException` event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer som standard i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>hendelsen så lenge et feilsøkingsprogram ikke er tilknyttet, og brukeren behandler den `UnhandledException` hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kan angi den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> is `False`, or if the event is not handled, the application exits upon return from the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>er `False`, eller hvis hendelsen ikke behandles, programmet avsluttes ved retur fra unntak behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, control of the application is returned to the Windows Forms message loop.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, returneres kontroll over programmet til Windows Forms meldingen sløyfen.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException"> </xref> hendelsen oppstod.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the application's open forms.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av alle programmets åpne skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.OpenForms` property gets a collection of all the application's open forms.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.OpenForms` egenskapen henter en samling av alle programmets åpne skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: The behavior is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten er identisk med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `My.Application.OpenForms` property returns all open forms, regardless of which thread opened them.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I `My.Application.OpenForms` egenskapen returnerer åpne skjemaer, uavhengig av hvilken tråd åpnet dem.

trans-unit.source: You should check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property of each form before accessing it; otherwise, it might throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Du bør kontrollere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>hver skjemaet før du åpner den; hvis ikke, den throw en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>unntak.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormCollection"></xref> object that contains all of the application's open forms.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder alle åpne programmets-skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: Sets up and starts the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer og starter Visual Basic applikasjons-modellen.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Run` method provides support for the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.Run` metoden gir støtte for den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called only from the application's `Sub Main`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare kalles fra programmets `Sub Main`.

trans-unit.source: By default, the `Sub Main` of a Windows Forms application calls this method.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i `Sub Main` av et Windows Forms program kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | Ikke | | Konsollen programmet | Ikke | | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | Ikke | | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | Ikke | | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: Array of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Array av typen <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The command line from <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sub Main" name="Sub Main" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kommandolinjen fra <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sub Main" name="Sub Main" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application saves the user settings on exit.
trans-unit.target: Angir om programmet lagrer brukerinnstillingene ved avslutning.

trans-unit.source: The `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property allows the user to change how the application saves settings, at run time.
trans-unit.target: Den `SaveMySettingsOnExit` egenskapen tillater brukeren å endre hvordan programmet lagrer innstillingene, på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly save setting changes by using the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> method of the `My.Settings` object.
trans-unit.target: Kan du eksplisitt lagrer innstillingen endres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>metoden for den `My.Settings` objektet.</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing and saving settings, see [Application Properties](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endring og lagring av innstillinger [egenskapene for applikasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i denne egenskapen er ikke opprettholdt når programmet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: To change the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**: || |-| |To change the setting in the Project Designer| |1.
trans-unit.target: Endre den `SaveMySettingsOnExit` egenskapen permanent, må du endre innstillingen i den **prosjektet Designer**: || |-| | Endre innstillingen i prosjektet Designer | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: Har et prosjekt som er valgt i **Løsningsutforsker**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: Klikk **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. trans-unit.target: 3. Velg **lagre My.Settings avsluttet**. | ## Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | Ikke | | Konsollen programmet | Ikke | | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | Ikke | | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | Ikke | | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> indicates that the application saves the user settings on exit.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Angir at programmet lagrer brukerinnstillingene ved avslutning.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the settings are not implicitly saved.
trans-unit.target: Ellers lagres innstillingene implisitt ikke.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the application has a splash screen defined, and if it does, displays it.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om programmet har en velkomstbildet definert, og hvis den finnes, viser den.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method calls `OnCreateSplashScreen` in a thread-safe way.
trans-unit.target: Som standard denne metodekall `OnCreateSplashScreen` på en sikker måte.

trans-unit.source: The ShowSplashScreen method contains the code that displays the splash screen for at least the number of milliseconds specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ShowSplashScreen inneholder koden som vises i velkomstbildet skjermen antall millisekunder som er angitt av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, you must set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the ShowSplashScreen or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> method, or add the splash screen to your application using the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne funksjonen, må du angi den `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` egenskap i en metode som overstyrer ShowSplashScreen eller <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>metode, eller Legg til velkomstbildet til programmet ved hjelp av den **prosjektet Designer**.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når programmet avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `Shutdown` event before it exits.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et program i `Shutdown` hendelse før den avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to control how the application closes its resources.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg kontrollere hvordan programmet lukkes ressursene.

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er en del av den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The code for the `Shutdown` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Koden for den `Shutdown` hendelsesbehandlingen er lagret i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines what happens when the application's main form closes.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer hva som skjer når programmets skjema lukkes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> method checks the value of this property to determine if the application should shut down when the main form is closed, or if another open form should be promoted as the new main form.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>metoden kontrollerer verdien for denne til å fastslå om programmet må avsluttes når primære skjemaet lukkes, eller hvis en annen åpne skjemaet skal forfremmes som det nye primære skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ShutdownMode"></xref> enumeration value, indicating what the application should do when the main form closes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ShutdownMode"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som viser hva programmet skal gjøre når primære skjemaet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the splash screen for this application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir velkomstbildet for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.SplashScreen` property allows you to get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object that the application uses as the splash screen, the first graphic form that is displayed while an application is being started.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.SplashScreen` egenskapen kan du hente eller angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>objekt som bruker programmet som velkomstbildet, den første grafisk som vises under en applikasjon startes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property supports the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støtter Visual Basic applikasjons-modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i denne egenskapen er ikke opprettholdt når programmet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: To change the splash screen permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre velkomstbildet permanent, må du endre innstillingen i den **prosjektet Designer**.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> object that the application uses as the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> objekt som bruker programmet som velkomstbildet.

trans-unit.source: The same value is assigned to this property and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den samme verdien som er tilordnet denne egenskapen og <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application starts.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når applikasjonen starter.

trans-unit.source: A normal (non-single-instance) application raises the `Startup` event every time it starts.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et vanlig (ikke-enkel forekomst)-program i `Startup` hendelsen hver gang den startes.

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application raises the `Startup` event when it starts only if the application is not already active; otherwise, it raises the `StartupNextInstance` event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et program for enkel forekomst av `Startup` hendelsen ved oppstart bare hvis programmet er allerede aktiv; hvis ikke, den opphøyer den `StartupNextInstance` hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er en del av den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the `e` parameter to control the loading of an application's startup form.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den `e` parameteren til å kontrollere innlasting av skjemaet for et program oppstart.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property is set to `True`, the startup form does not start.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>er satt til `True`, skjemaet startet ikke starter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, your code should call an alternate startup code path.
trans-unit.target: Koden bør i så fall kalle kodebane en alternativ startet.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A> property of the `e` parameter or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> property to access the application's command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>for den `e` parameteren eller <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>til å få tilgang til programmets kommandolinjeargumenter.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the `Startup` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Koden for den `Startup` hendelsesbehandlingen er lagret i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when attempting to start a single-instance application and the application is already active.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når forsøk på å starte en enkel forekomst-programmet, og programmet er allerede aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application raises the StartupNextInstance event when you attempt to restart the application when it is already active.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt forekomst applikasjon opphøyer StartupNextInstance-hendelse når du prøver å starte programmet på nytt når den er allerede aktiv.

trans-unit.source: When a single-instance application starts for the first time, it raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: Når et program for enkel forekomst starter for første gang, den opphøyer den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er en del av den [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår i programmets hovedtråden med de andre hendelsene i brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at hendelsesbehandlingen skal få direkte tilgang til programmets brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis programmet er opptatt med å behandle en annen brukergrensesnittet-hendelse når denne hendelsen oppstår, denne hendelsen kan ikke behandles før andre hendelsesbehandlingen avsluttes eller kaller den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `StartupNextInstance` event is raised only in single-instance applications.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `StartupNextInstance` denne hendelsen oppstår bare i enkel forekomst programmer.

trans-unit.source: To enable single-instance behavior for your application, you must check the **Make single instance application** check box in the Project Designer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere enkel forekomst virkemåte for programmet, må du kontrollere den **Kontroller forekomst av programmet** avmerkingsboks i prosjektet Designer.

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To make an application single instance| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| | Foreta en enkelt forekomst programmet | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: Med et prosjekt som er valgt i **Løsningsutforsker**, klikker du **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. Select the **Make single instance application** check box.| You must use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A> property of the `e` parameter to access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: 3. Velg den **Kontroller forekomst programmet** avmerkingsboks. | Du må bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>for den `e` parameter for å få tilgang til argumentene for senere forsøk på å starte en enkel forekomst-program.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> property provides the arguments used to start the first instance of a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>egenskapen gir argumentene som brukes til å starte den første forekomsten av en enkel forekomst-programmet.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the StartupNextInstance event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Koden for hendelsesbehandlingen StartupNextInstance er lagret i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| | Tilgang til vinduet Redigeringsprogram for kode for programmet hendelser | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når programmet støter på et ubehandlet unntak.

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `UnhandledException` event when it encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et program i `UnhandledException` -hendelse når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak.

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er en del av Visual Basic applikasjons-modellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the `e` parameter to access the unhandled exception that caused this event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>for den `e` parameter for å få tilgang til et ubehandlet unntak som førte til denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> property of the `e` parameter to control whether the application exits.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>for den `e` parameteren til å kontrollere om programmet avslutter.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> is `True`.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>er `True`.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the application exits after completing the `UnhandledException` event handler.
trans-unit.target: Derfor programmet avslutter etter fullføring av `UnhandledException` hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: You can set the value to `False` in the `UnhandledException` event handler to keep the application running, and have it return to a waiting state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi verdien til `False` i den `UnhandledException` hendelsesbehandlingen å beholde programmet kjører, og det gå tilbake til en ventende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The code for the `UnhandledException` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Koden for den `UnhandledException` hendelsesbehandlingen er lagret i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| | Tilgang til vinduet Redigeringsprogram for kode for programmet hendelser | |&1;.

trans-unit.target: Med et prosjekt som er valgt i **Løsningsutforsker**, klikker du **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.| For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 3. Velg den **vise programmet hendelser** for å åpne redigeringsprogrammet for koden. | Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [programmet siden prosjektet Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visual Basic compiler prevents applications that are built for debugging from raising this event, to enable a debugger to handle the unhandled exceptions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I Visual Basic kompilatoren hindrer programmer som er bygget for feilsøking fra å heve denne hendelsen for å aktivere et feilsøkingsprogram å behandle et ubehandlet unntak.

trans-unit.source: This means that if you are testing your application by running it under the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment debugger, your `UnhandledException` event handler will not be called.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at hvis du tester programmet ved å kjøre under Visual Studio integrert utviklingsmiljø-feilsøkingsprogram din `UnhandledException` hendelsesbehandlingen ikke blir kalt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building applications for debugging, see [/debug (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger programmer for feilsøking i [/Debug (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Oppgaver tabellen nedenfor viser eksempler på oppgaver som involverer den `My.Application.UnhandledException` hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this property allows a designer to specify the default text rendering engine for the application's forms.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, kan denne egenskapen en designer til å angi standard gjengivelsesmotoren for teksten for programmets skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property returns `False` to indicate that the GDI text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] be used for the application's forms.
trans-unit.target: Som standard denne egenskapen returnerer `False` å angi at GDI-teksten gjengivelse motoren for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] brukes for programmets skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this property to return `True` and specify that the application's forms use the GDI+ text rendering engine, which is used in Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid overstyre denne til å returnere `True` og angi programmets skjemaer bruker GDI + teksten gjengivelsesmotoren, som brukes i Visual Basic .NET 2002 og Visual Basic .NET 2003.

trans-unit.source: This property is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kalles av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>konstruktør.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: Code that overrides methods of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: Kode som overstyrer metoder for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>klassen må angis i filen ApplicationEvents.vb er skjult som standard.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| | Tilgang til vinduet kode redigeringsprogrammet for overstyrer medlemmer | |&1;.

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: Med et prosjekt som er valgt i **Løsningsutforsker**, klikker du **Egenskaper** på den **prosjektet** menyen.

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2. Velg den **programmet** kategorien.

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3. Velg den **vise programmet hendelser** for å åpne redigeringsprogrammet for koden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).|
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [programmet siden prosjektet Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> indicates that the application should use the default text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref> indikerer at programmet skal bruke standard gjengivelsesmotoren for teksten for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> indicates that the application should use the text rendering engine for Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref> indikerer at programmet skal bruke gjengivelsesmotoren for teksten for Visual Basic .NET 2002 og Visual Basic .NET 2003.
